Downloaded and ran the extraction app. Works perfect. Make sure that you update your .NET framework - the links can be found in this v.1.0.4 torrent description here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6460748/Terraria.v1.0.4.cracked-THETA

Also, if you're looking for servers, most are now running v.1.0.5 and can be found here:

http://www.terrariaonline-servers.com/

Also note, you'll have to port forward BOTH ports 7777 AND 31337 on your router if you want to play online servers. Most v.1.0.4+ servers now use port 7777 so enter this after entering the server IP in multiplayer.

To learn how to port-forward Terraria, go here:

http://portforward.com/english/applications/port_forwarding/Terraria/Terrariaindex.htm

Lastly, some people use Hamachi if they can't port-forward. This isn't suggested if you CAN port-forward as it opens up your computer to outsiders. If the server IS using Hamachi - it's IP will start with a 5. If you need to use Hamachi - get it here:

http://hamachi.en.softonic.com/download

Finally, to use Hamachi with Terraria - watch the first video here which is 6min by UKJaMiEUK ... It deals with both setting up and joining a server:

http://www.google.ca/search?sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8&q=How+to+Set+up+a+Terraria+Server+youtube

And that's pretty much it.  Enjoy!

Hey, I was playing multiplayer on some server I found online for a good 5-10 hours and then I randomly get kicked and my internet d/c'ed (I'm using a mobile broadband). So I decided I had enough playing for one day and I'll continue tomorrow. So it's tomorrow now and I now whenever I try to join ANY server in general, I'm stuck at the Connecting to  screen. 

Any help would be appreciated!!!

It seems to be a fairly common issue and apparently theres no real explanation as to why it happends. I can only give you 4 solutions that might help you.

1.) Use a new character

2.) Check if your pc needs needs some updates. (Drivers and the such)

3.) Do a system restore to when it worked properly.

4.)Make your own server??

I got same problem as UltimeRz! i start the game, then a Terraria: Error comes! and it creates a txt file called 'crashlog' What must i do?! i have reinstalled both .net and xna!
I reinstalled Terraria theta 1.04 and now it dont work ether! it creates a process but then after 10 sec it ends! what must i do?
It puts me that :( : http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/787947TERRAriaPOURPIRATBAY.png

Alright gimme some more info on your error then. The only guess I got Is that the installer's within the Unleashed folder have somehow become corrupt. Ok follow these instructions. 

1.) Uninstall both .Net and XNA

2.) Restart your computer

3.) Download and install these make sure you install .Net first.

.Net
http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=17851

XNA
http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=20914


If this doesnt help then please post some more info and if you find a specific error tell me.

Thanks! I didn't know about the XNA install. I installed just the first .net framework, after I installed both at your last link it worked for me. I was getting an error(Using winXP pro 32-bit) whenever I ran it and gave me the standard "There was a problem and Terraria needs to close."

-Andrew

@UltimeRz
 It says you dont have Xna installed properly... Follow the links I posted.

And no you dont need previous versions for this one to work.

Download at your own risk
